**Speakers:** Francis Juanes  
**Overview:**  
The goal of this project is to determine the causes of vateritic otolith development (ear bones that have crystalized resulting in hearing loss) in hatchery-reared Strait of Georgia coho salmon to investigate the consequences for survival and in turn population recovery.
